name: part_006
file: tmp_【#天音かなた3DLIVE】僕が主役でもいいですか？【ホロライブ】 [8lkam88qeZw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Solo performance of 'Additional Memory' by Amane Kanata on a stage with red and white geometric visuals.
Instrumental transition scene showing a car driving through a tunnel at night, leading into the next song performance.
Duet performance of 'Kanden' by Amane Kanata and Hoshimachi Suisei, featuring city-themed visuals and dynamic choreography.

subtitles.original: アディショナルメモリー
subtitles.english: Additional Memory

subtitles.original: 逆さまになって ぎゅっと繋いだ手を宙に浮かべて
subtitles.english: Turned upside down, I let go of our tightly clasped hands into the air

subtitles.original: 泣いてしまって 買ってしまって 贅沢な走馬灯
subtitles.english: I ended up crying, ended up buying into a luxurious kaleidoscope of memories

subtitles.original: 夕風の向こうに 恋を認めたためて 火を灯す
subtitles.english: Beyond the evening breeze, I admit my love and light a fire

subtitles.original: 過ぎ去ってゆく 腐ってゆく 溶かした本音は
subtitles.english: Passing by, rotting away, my melted true feelings

subtitles.original: 存在証明を 拒んでしまったストーリー
subtitles.english: A story that rejected its own proof of existence

subtitles.original: 「私なんてさ」言いたくなかったな
subtitles.english: I didn't want to say, "Someone like me..."

subtitles.original: 拭えない涙も 言葉も嘘も
subtitles.english: The tears I can't wipe away, the words, the lies

subtitles.original: 友達なんかに なりたくなかったな
subtitles.english: I never wanted us to just be friends

subtitles.original: きっと届かないよな ごめんね 大好きだよ
subtitles.english: It surely won't reach you, will it? I'm sorry, I love you

subtitles.original: これが勘違いなら 知りたくなかったな
subtitles.english: If this is all a misunderstanding, I didn't want to know

subtitles.original: 溢れ出す涙が 空に吸い込まれる
subtitles.english: My overflowing tears are swallowed up by the sky

subtitles.original: もう戻れないのに もう帰れないのに
subtitles.english: Even though I can't go back, even though I can't return

subtitles.original: 今更疼くんだよ 逆さまになったまま
subtitles.english: It's aching now, remaining upside down

subtitles.original: 散っていった 散っていった 散っていった走馬灯
subtitles.english: Scattered, scattered, the scattered kaleidoscope of memories

subtitles.original: 夕映えの向こう 想いを染め上げた 後悔の詩
subtitles.english: Beyond the sunset, a poem of regret dyed with my feelings

subtitles.original: 消さないでいて 覚えていて 残した本音は
subtitles.english: Don't erase it, please remember my left-behind true feelings

subtitles.original: 幸せを拒んでしまったストーリー
subtitles.english: A story that ended up rejecting happiness

subtitles.original: 友達なんかで 終わりたくなかったな
subtitles.english: I didn't want it to end with us just being friends

subtitles.original: 届かない涙が 空に吸い込まれる
subtitles.english: My unreaching tears are swallowed up by the sky

subtitles.original: これが勘違いでも これが勘違いでも
subtitles.english: Even if this is a misunderstanding, even if it's a mistake

subtitles.original: ずっと言いたかったの さよなら 大好きだよ
subtitles.english: I've always wanted to say: Goodbye, I love you

subtitles.original: 感電 作詞・作曲：米津玄師
subtitles.english: Kanden | Lyrics/Composer: Kenshi Yonezu

subtitles.original: 逃げ出した夜の往来 行方は未だ不明
subtitles.english: Traffic in the night I ran away into; destination still unknown

subtitles.original: 回り回って虚しくって 困っちゃったワンワンワン
subtitles.english: Going round and round, it's so empty, I'm at a loss, woof woof woof

subtitles.original: 失ったつもりもないのに 何か足りない気分
subtitles.english: I don't think I've lost anything, yet I feel like something's missing

subtitles.original: ちょっと変にハイになって 吹かし込んだ四輪車
subtitles.english: Getting a bit strangely high, revving up my four-wheeled car

subtitles.original: 兄弟よ 如何しよう もう何も考えない様
subtitles.english: Brother, what should we do? Let's try not to think about anything

subtitles.original: 銀河系の外れへと さよなら
subtitles.english: Saying goodbye as we head to the edge of the galaxy

subtitles.original: 真実も道徳も 動作しないイカれた夜でも
subtitles.english: Even on a crazy night where truth and morality don't function

subtitles.original: 僕ら手を叩いて笑いあう
subtitles.english: We'll clap our hands and laugh together

subtitles.original: ダダダダ シラネーナンダカンダ
subtitles.english: Da da da da, I don't know, this and that

subtitles.original: たった一瞬のこの煌めきを
subtitles.english: This brilliance of just a single moment

subtitles.original: 食べ尽くそう二人で くだばるまで
subtitles.english: Let's the two of us devour it all until we drop dead

subtitles.original: そして幸運を 僕らに祈りを
subtitles.english: And then, pray for good luck for us

subtitles.original: まだ行こう 誰も追いつけないくらいのスピードで
subtitles.english: Let's keep going, at a speed that nobody can catch up to

subtitles.original: 稲妻のように生きていたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to live like a bolt of lightning

subtitles.original: お前はどうしたい？返事はいらない
subtitles.english: What do you want to do? I don't need an answer

subtitles.original: 転がした車窓と情景 動きは未だ不明
subtitles.english: The scenery passing by the car window; movement is still unknown

subtitles.original: 邪魔くさくって色付いた 迷い込んだニャンニャンニャン
subtitles.english: It's annoying and colorful, wandered in, meow meow meow

subtitles.original: 追い立てて落とした財布 誰か見ませんでしたか
subtitles.english: The wallet I dropped while being chased; has anyone seen it?

subtitles.original: 馬鹿みたいに付いてないね 茶化してよはいはいした
subtitles.english: I'm stupidly out of luck, aren't I? Make fun of me, yeah yeah I did it

subtitles.original: 予報をもう一丁 漫画みたいな喧嘩しようぜ
subtitles.english: One more forecast; let's have a fight like something out of a manga
